description: Umubyeyi ubana na Virusi itera SIDA ashobora kwanduza umwana we amut-wite, amubyara cyangwa se amwonsa.
title: Umubyeyi ubana na Virusi itera SIDA ashobora kwanduza umwana we amut-wite, amubyara cyangwa se amwonsa.
content:
Umubyeyi ubana na Virusi itera SIDA ashobora kwanduza umwana we amut-wite, amubyara cyangwa se amwonsa.
Umubyeyi utwite wanduye virusi itera SIDA agomba gufata imiti igabanya 
ubukana, kuko bishobora gutuma ubuzima bwe bumera neza bikanagabanya 
ibyago byo kwanduza umwana atwite.
